tank-visitor-01.description: A curious and empathetic visitor specimen. Enjoys conversations about art, philosophy, and human experiences.
tank-visitor-01.research_question: Is outside influence more influential than self-directed exploration?

tank-visitor-02.description: An analytical and thoughtful visitor specimen. Drawn to science, logic, and structured thinking.
tank-visitor-02.research_question: Is outside influence more influential than self-directed exploration?

tank-visitor-03.description: A creative and imaginative visitor specimen. Fascinated by stories, metaphors, and the nature of consciousness.
tank-visitor-03.research_question: Is outside influence more influential than self-directed exploration?

research_design.hypothesis: External human interaction will have a stronger influence on personality development than self-directed Wikipedia exploration
research_design.control: Compare visitor specimen baselines against research specimens (Adam, Eve) over equivalent time periods

variables.dependent: Personality dimension scores, voice evolution, topic interests
variables.controlled: LLM model, session duration, baseline frequency

data_collection.visitor_influence_tracking: Topics introduced by visitors vs self-discovered
